page.title: 03General Survey continued.
page.content: Of those making returns 15 were retired or widowed. The land use survey produced the following results: 50% grass _ dairy cattle and sheep. 30% cereals _ wheat,barley oats in that order. 20% orchards,gardens and woods. Orchards are mainly commercial apple growing. The area is poorly served by public transport and to help overcome this the Newent & District Disabled Club run a 'dial a ride' minibus service for the disabled & elderly. Such folk from this area can go to Newent on a friday & Gloucester on a thursday by this means and to other locations (eg Tewkesbury / Cheltenham) less frequently.
